alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Jackson; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 22 at 3:47PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 14 inches, with the highest amounts in the James River Valley in South Dakota and along the Buffalo Ridge in Minnesota. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Minnesota and central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cottonwood; Jackson; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock
